for_sales.sales_text: Lovely condition, stored indoors every winter. Rigged length 21’, seats six. Gaff rigged with tan sails and wooden spars, cream hull. Holt roller reeling for foresail. Nav. lights and marine battery. 3.5 Garmin GPS map555 and switch panel. 3.5 Mariner outboard serviced and winterised every year. Cushions, covers and spray hood. Anchor, chain, warp, fenders and manual bilge pump. Braked road trailer with spare wheel. Currently ashore in Cheshire.

boat.name: Gradely Lass

ownerships.note: Previous owner to I Fraser was Mrs P Taggart
ownerships.text: Previous owner to I Fraser was Mrs P Taggart

boat.short_description: 'Gradely Lass' is a 21' coastal whammel, built by Character Boats in 2009.
